snippet: A small, but increasingly visible, consumer class in Cuba has a taste for luxuries, albeit modest ones by American standards, which has caught the eye of the island’s entrepreneurs.
abstract: Easing of economic restrictions in Cuba has created small but growing consumer class,  and savvy entrepreneurs are finding ways to provide them with modest luxuries like sports bars, 3-D movies and car washes.
lead_paragraph: A small, but increasingly visible, consumer class in Cuba has a taste for luxuries, albeit modest ones by American standards, which has caught the eye of the island’s entrepreneurs.

headline.main: Slowly, Cuba Is Developing an Appetite for Spending
headline.print_headline: Slowly, Cuba Is Developing An Appetite For Spending
